title: Very strange lag(under 100ms, over 200fps) both in client and in game
body: Since patch, I have gotten very strange latency where when I do things it seems to do it on my screen for a split second then it jerks and decides that it didn't actually get the command or something. In regards to both client and in game, right now I pressed play and it's just stuck and greyed out as if it just can't comprehend the command being received.

replies.body: Ahhhh that sounds a lot like packet loss, which happens before your connection ever reaches our servers so it can be hard to do much on our end. Let's run a quick check for packet loss before jumping to conclusions though by using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Grab your latest network logs and let that tool scan it, but pop the info it gives you back here so I can go over it with ya.

https://imgur.com/wEHK2Bl

says average 117ms lat, 0.03% packet loss, 14.4ms average jitter

Looked through a few and it appeared that all were similar. around 100ms, 0.05% packet loss, and 14ms jitter

It happens frequently, not like the whole game. But quite frequent.

I am using a Verizon Jetpack 7730L mobile hotspot connection(no other options in my case)

Hmmm alrighty that rules out packet loss. Go ahead and reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure you send over your network and game logs for them to take a look through so they can get a good idea of what's going on.
